meta.description: Emirates First Class Lounge at Dubai International Airport (DXB), Terminal 3, Concourse B. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Emirates First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: 4th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18, near the Information Desk.

lounge.description: Whenever you arrive in the Emirates Lounge, a selection of food and beverages will be available to you. The full bar service and large buffet, featuring a selection of fresh, healthy, wholesome food produced with the finest seasonal ingredients, will help revive you. From friendly and professional reception staff to a spacious and luxurious seating area, youâ€™ll find waiting for your flight remarkably soothing. Catch up with the latest news and programmes on large plasma screen TVs. Stay updated with a wide selection of international newspapers and magazines. Freshen up with a shower. Or simply sit back and relax. A fully-equipped Business Centre with independent work stations and complimentary broadband and wireless LAN access means you can stay connected up until your flight.

reviews.content: A true oasis of calm and relaxation. One of my favorite lounges in the world. Excellent food (be sure to try the eggs Benedict and the fresh sushi), fantastic staff and the ultimate of customer service.
The earliest massage service required an hour waiting which went past my boarding time and was disappointing. Quiet rooms were cold with small blankets that made them uncomfortable. Food was OK.
Make sure to get a massage! Great way to kill time during a layover.
I know of none better. Huge with anything you could want. One area has sit down menu ordered wait service. Food was excellent.
Just great. One of the best ones.
I love this lounge, it's a perfect, quiet, calm place to relax.
The best there is for me, I hope for more success to my favorite airline.
Great lounge, clean, friendly workers, and very upscale.
Great place to relax and have a bite to eat before a flight.
One of the best lounges in the world! Big, good food, friendly staff, the perfect way to start a trip with Emirates!
Huge lounge, though slightly smaller than terminal A, with all amenities. Every kind of food imaginable is basically available. Spa as well as shoe shine services are excellent.
As good as the Qantas First Class Lounge in Sydney, but bigger. A fantastic a la carte menu and wine list. You board via a separate entrance, making the whole experience even more unique.

location.terminalDirections: Arrivals Area.

otherLounges.name: Their Patio by Plaza Premium Group

location.terminalDirections: Located in the arrivals area after exiting baggage claim.
Take the lift located next to the souvenir shop to Level 6. Located prior to Gates A1-A12.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located between Gates A1 and A24 to the Hotel Reception on Level 6.
Level 4, between Gates A1 and A24.
Level 5, between Gates A2 and A3. Entrance is via dedicated elevator from the perfume area of the Duty Free Area.
Located in the West Wing of Concourse A, between Gates A2 and A3. Take the lift from the Duty Free Area to the entrance on Level 4.
Opposite Gate A1 in the Duty Free Area.
5th Floor, between Gates A1 and A24
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located near Gates B14 or B22 to the Hotel Reception.

otherLounges.name: Lounge @ B (Closed for Renovation, Temp Lounge at Gate B22)

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate B26, above McDonald's on the 2nd Floor, accessible via escalator, entrance is located inside the Cadiz Tapas Bar.
Level 4, near Gate B21, entrance is right after XpresSpa.

otherLounges.name: Sleep n' Fly Sleep Lounge, Business Pods and Showers

location.terminalDirections: Located between Gates B14 and B18, close to the Emirates Connections Desk.
5th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18.
Located next to Gate C13.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the escalators or elevators located between Gates C15 and C17 to the Hotel Reception.
East End of Concourse C, between Gates C21 and C23.

C-Gates, Central Lower Level Duty Free Area. Lounge check-in is via the separate main reception at departure gate level next to Gate C14. The sleep 'n fly lounge is located one level down in the Duty Free Area.
Near Gate C8.
Near Gate C28.
